title: Wire facilitator to Coinbase
description: Replace the mock verify/settle stubs with real HTTP calls to the Coinbase x402 facilitator while keeping mocks available via env flags.
tests: node backend/src/server.js; curl -i http://localhost:3000/joke; node backend/agent/agent.js \tell me a joke\""

title: Align frontend with paid API
description: Point the Vite UI at GET http://localhost:3000/joke, surface the 402 requirement, and display the paid joke/audit result so users can run the flow from the browser.
tests: npm --prefix frontend run dev; exercise paid flow in browser
